archimate:Requirement.name: PA.2.2.4d: d) perform allowlisting or denylisting of externally developed apps (e.g. based on reputation analysis that examines developer history and the type of information that the app is looking to access and share)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
